PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-09312016-10-21,  ,  ,  ESDC, 
ActOld Age Security Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Old Age Security Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OLD AGE SECURITY REGULATIONS in order to improve services and create administrative efficiencies by increasing the number of seniors who can receive the full Old Age Security pension through automatic enrolment, thus removing the burden for seniors of completing applications and reducing administrative costs to government.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0274 Publication Date: 2016-11-02
AttachmentsAttachment
